name: Shieldon

evolution.description: Shieldon can evolve into Bastiodon at level 8 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 13 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Shield Pokémon. A Pokémon that lived in jungles around 100 million years ago. Its facial hide is extremely hard.

abilities.name: Sturdy
abilities.description: When taking damage equal to half or more of your current HP, roll a d4. On a result of 3 of 4, halve the damage dealt.

abilities.name: Soundproof
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to sound-based moves.
